item.title: Best Rick Roll
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:10, topic:127046”]thats so annoying

NICE SPOILERS though…

you know i exited it through task manager… then when firefox was re-loading i accidentally clicked “restore last session” and had to sit through it again[/quote]

I know, i was like shit, exited it, then unthinkingly I pressed restore session, and had to do it again :\ damn, good rickroll.
